```{r}

library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
edu_data <- get_acs(
  geography = "tract",
  variables = c(
    total = "B15003_001",       # Total population 25+ years
    bach = "B15003_022",        # Bachelor's degree
    masters = "B15003_023",     # Master's degree
    prof = "B15003_024",        # Professional school degree
    doctorate = "B15003_025"    # Doctorate degree
  ),
  county = "Los Angeles",
  state = "CA",
  year = 2023,
  geometry = TRUE,
  output = "wide"
)
```
